title: Unable to use init action when building on openshift
body:
### Describe the bug

When having an application using the init-container / job support to pre-initialize the environment, and when deploying this application using:

```
 quarkus deploy openshift --image-build 
```

The job fails as the image is not built: 

```
coffeeshop-service-kafka-topic-init-2rwbb image pull backoff
```



### Expected behavior

The image must be built.

### Actual behavior

The image is not.
